start.text:
You wake up in a mysterious forest with only an old map in your backpack.
There are two paths ahead of you.

check_map.text: You look at your old map. It shows a secret passage to the right!

choices.text: Ignore the map and go left

left_path.text: You walk down the left path and find a shiny golden key on the ground.

right_path.text: You walk down the right path and see a locked door ahead.

secret_passage.text: Following the map, you find a hidden tunnel that leads to a treasure chamber!

try_door.text: The door is locked tight. You need a key to open it.

locked_door.text: You arrive at the same locked door, but now you have the golden key!

unlock_door.text: The golden key works perfectly! The door opens to reveal a beautiful garden.

garden.text: You enter a magical garden filled with singing flowers and dancing butterflies. You've found paradise!

victory_with_treasure.text: You escape through the secret tunnel with the ancient treasure. You're rich and safe!
